title: Touches L2 - PUM
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark bottom margin, in pencil: [Touches L2-PUM Ayomi \'8
description: multicolored leaf like pattern against a brown background; leaf like objects printed in mustard, purple, red, green, rust, bright magenta, and bright aqua; background color is made of multiple layers of green, magenta, and blue
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
